remarks: Group multiple (exponentiation) operation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2014.)
statement:
mulgval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
mulgval.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
mulgval.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
mulgval.i $e |- I = ( invg ` G ) $.
mulgval.t $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
mulgval.s $e |- S = seq 1 ( .+ , ( NN X. { X } ) ) $.
mulgval $p |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ X e. B ) -> ( N .x. X ) = if ( N = 0 , .0. , if ( 0 < N , ( S ` N ) , ( I ` ( S ` -u N ) ) ) ) ) $.
